trends.name: Remote Work Tools
trends.description: The rise of remote work drives demand for better collaboration tools.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create verticalized tools or improve existing ones with AI.

trends.name: Personalized Health
trends.description: Growing interest in personal health and wellness leads to demand for personalized solutions.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create a wearable or app that provides real-time health data and personalized insights.

trends.name: Green Tech
trends.description: Consumers and businesses look for sustainable, eco-friendly solutions.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Design innovative green technologies or improve existing ones.

trends.name: AI in Customer Service
trends.description: Businesses leverage AI to improve customer service and support.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Develop AI chatbots or support platforms for businesses.

trends.name: Virtual Reality Entertainment
trends.description: Virtual reality takes entertainment to new, immersive levels.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create VR experiences or hardware for niche markets.
